package.description:
A complete package for 3D point cloud processing, oferring both generic libraries and specific purpose nodes.
The list of libraries includes:
- cloud_geometry: areas, distances, intersections, 3D normals/features estimation, norms, projections, statistics, transformations, etc
- cloud_io: a library for Input/Output PCD (Point Cloud Data) processing
- sample_consensus: a library for SAmple Consensus (SAC) like methods (RANSAC, MSAC, MLESAC, etc,) and geometric shape models
The list of nodes includes: - cloud_downsampler_node: a node which uniformly downsamples a 3D point cloud
